item.title: Deepfake Audio with Wav2Lip
item.author: Chiawei Lim
item.description: Overview of Deepfake Technology Deepfake is a technology that creates synthesis media with a subfield of Machine Learning - Deep Learning. Photo by the author A common use case that the public is aware of is the application of face-swapping. A target face is swapped and merged, often seamlessly on first glance view, to create an altered event. Photo by the author On a high level, Deepfake can be split into 3 sub-domains based on the focus of the media to alter.

item.title: Speech-to-Text Demo Trained on Conversational Speech
item.author: Chiawei Lim
item.description: Huggingface Space Quick Demo of speech-to-text model trained with wav2vec2-conformer Try the model with Examples provided Upload audio files with extension .wav/.mp3/.flac Recordings through microphone Photo by the author Note Detailed notes about the data preparation, model training and serving will be elaborated.

item.title: Understand Audio Data with Computer Vision Background
item.author: Chiawei Lim
item.description: Side by side comparison of audio and visual data for quick understanding.

item.title: Youtube to Text with Speech Recognition in Python
item.author: Chiawei Lim
item.description: Python-based libraries to download Youtube videos for NLP use cases
